name: HOMS
description: HOMS (Home Operating Management System) is a ground-breaking software solution designed to streamline operations in housing societies and residential communities. This tool offers features such as customizable ticket management, full invoicing support, alert mechanisms, newsroom, and clearances, among others. HOMS empowers administrators with robust management capabilities and provides residents with a seamless, user-friendly platform for communication, requests, and tracking. The system has been built to cater to global standards, ensuring scalability and adaptability in diverse environments. Our vision is to enhance residential living experiences through technology, ensuring convenience, efficiency, and tranquility.

name: EcoShapers

Following are the PRODUCT BENEFITS: • More durable than conventional bricks • Reduces environmental pollution • Reduces use of clay in bricks • Offer greater endurance  • Offer good heat insulating properties • Utilizes plastic waste from landfills • Contributes to construction of low-cost housing and disaster-relief shelters

name: SpoFlex
description: SpoFlex is a sports community hangout platform similar to LinkedIn, where a user, whether he/she is a part of Player domain, Organizer domain, Sponsor domain or Recruiter domain, is provided with domain-specific specialized features, and both intradomain and interdomain connecting options. SpoFlex systematically builds domain-specific sports profile or resume for its users of all domains.

name: TapitCard
description: TapitCard revolutionizing the traditional paper business cards by replacing it with TapitCard.  We use Near Field Communication technology to allow for a faster, more secure, and eco-friendly way of exchanging contact information with JUST A TAP. The elimination of manual data entry saves time and reduces the potential for errors, while the reduction in paper production and disposal is more environmentally sustainable. Additionally, TapitCard offers real-time updates and enhanced data security, ensuring the accuracy and safety of the contact information exchanged. With TapitCard, the user can add up more data which includes Social links, profile pictures, descriptions, and shop links and they can be shared in seconds. It is a Lead Generating Tool: The entire shop is shared with the other person along with the contacts and that person can shop Directly anytime. Users can build their brand with our customizable Tapit store according to their preferences including Themes, logo, Patterns, and text.  Moreover, the use of digital contact cards can also provide businesses with a competitive edge, as they offer an innovative and modern approach to networking. The personalized service offered by digital contact card providers, such as custom designs and branding, can also help businesses stand out in a crowded marketplace. By embracing this new technology, businesses can improve their networking efficiency, reduce their carbon footprint, and enhance their overall professional image.
